item.description: <p>Police are sceptical that an estimated 40,000 people rallying for Palestine at the iconic Sydney Opera House can be kept safe.</p>

item.title: Sydney teen masks up for court over six-hour gang rape claims
item.description: <p>Adam Abdul-Hamid was in Campbelltown Local Court on Wednesday.</p>

item.title: 'This could be the end': Surfer who survived shark attack relives dramatic Kangaroo Island encounter
item.description: <p>Lee Berryman was surfing at a popular break, known as The Sewer, when he was attacked by what is believed to be a ﻿bronze whaler shark.</p>

item.title: Headlock or lawnmower may have killed Frances Crawford, court told
item.description: <p>Frances Elizabeth Crawford was found dead near a ride-on lawnmower at the base of a retaining wall at a rural Upper Lockyer property, west of Brisbane, in July 2024.</p>

item.title: Little-known bacteria causing increasing rates of potentially deadly infections
item.description: <p>A﻿ little-known strep bacteria is causing a growing number of potentially deadly infections and is disproportionately affecting Indigenous Australians.</p>

item.title: Accused body-in-fridge killer pushes for charge to be dropped
item.description: <p>An accused killer has asked a magistrate to throw out his murder charge, claiming a young woman could have died from a drug overdose before he allegedly hid her body in a fridge.</p>

item.title: Western Sydney University email cyber breach was designed to 'hurt' students and damage school's reputation, v
item.description: <p>Western Sydney University suffered a major data leak on Monday when mass emails were sent to current and former students, with some claiming degrees had been &quot;revoked&quot; retrospectively.</p>

item.title: 'Heart was jumping out of my chest﻿': Rex Airlines passengers look out the window to see plane on fire
item.description: <p>A mechanical fault caused a plane engine to catch fire ﻿just moments after take-off, leading to operations at Adelaide Airport being temporarily shut down.</p>

item.title: Two top Australian public universities face class action lawsuits over 'misleading' degrees
item.description: <p>Students have accused the University of Newcastle and Western Sydney University of offering courses with no professional recognition.</p>

item.title: Head monk allegedly abused children as young as four, court hears
item.description: <p>Venerable Naotunne Vijitha faced the first day of a jury trial at Victoria&#x27;s County Court today.</p>

item.title: Hoddle Street mass killer Julian Knight moved to 'campus-style' prison with lower security
item.description: <p>Knight was sentenced﻿ a non-parole period of 27 years behind bars for fatally shooting seven people and injuring another 19 in Clifton Hill in Melbourne 1987.</p>

item.title: Three charged with murder after man allegedly tortured for days before his death
item.description: <p>Police say Brisbane man Andrew Burow was tortured over several days at multiple locations before his remains were dumped hours from his home.</p>

item.title: Masked offenders filmed allegedly attacking students outside Melbourne school
item.description: <p>Footage has emerged of﻿ a group of masked offenders allegedly attacking students outside a school in Greenvale.</p>

item.title: Bad news for alleged criminals nabbed in AN0M app sting under Operation Ironside
item.description: <p>A final attempt to block information covertly obtained by Australian and US police through a digital Trojan horse in criminal networks has failed.</p>

item.title: Burleigh gets CCTV upgrade amid rising crime concerns
item.description: <p>The Queensland government has allocated $500,000 for the installation of 25 new CCTV cameras, more than doubling the existing network from 21 to 46 units.</p>

item.title: Paedophile allowed to have photo of his victims at his bedside as he died
item.description: <p>The family photo by Hume&#x27;s bedside was taken when both of his daughters were being abused ﻿and was requested by the inmate to have in palliative care at Cessnock Hospital.</p>

item.title: Growing number of Aussies are investing in ETFs. What are they and what are the risks?
item.description: <p>A growing number of ordinary Australians are pouring billions of their savings into exchange traded funds (ETFs), but what are they and what are the risks?</p>

item.title: Cargo door on Jetstar flight wide open as plane readies for takeoff
item.description: <p>Footage has captured a Jetstar flight taxiing on the runway of Sydney Airport with its cargo door wide open yesterday morning.</p>

item.title: Ex-AFL player Shannon Cox jailed over women's deaths
item.description: <p>An ex-AFL player who killed two elderly women in a car crash while driving under the influence of drugs with his daughter in the vehicle will spend at least eight-and-a-half years behind bars.</p>

item.title: Police probe three crime scenes after man killed in 'brazen', 'targeted' shooting in north-west Sydney
item.description: <p>Police believe he was a local man who was out for a walk when a gunman opened fire from a red Audi.</p>
